sen.j: 鷲崎 連（わしざき つらぬ、生没年不詳）は新選組平隊士。
sen.e: Tsuranu WASHIZAKI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a Hira Taishi (Regimental Soldier) of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Tsuranu WASHIZAKI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a Hira Taishi (Regimental Soldier) of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Tsuranu WASHIZAKI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a Hira Taishi (Regimental Soldier) of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.j: 元治元年七月十九日の禁門の変 (蛤御門の変) に参戦。
sen.e: On August 20, 1864, he Participated in the Kinmon Incident (Conspiracy of Hamaguri-gomon Gate).
On August 20, 1864, he participated in the Kinmon Incident (Conspiracy of Hamaguri-gomon Gate).
On August 20, 1864, he participated in the Kinmon Incident (Conspiracy of Hamaguri-gomon Gate).

sen.j: それ以前の事や、以後の消息も不明なため、天一坊改行のような虚構の人物の可能性が高い。
sen.e: Because his previous and subsequent information are unknown, he might be a fictitious character such as Kaigyo TENICHIBO.
